Uses of Class
com.webobjects.eocontrol.EOSharedEditingContext

Packages that use EOSharedEditingContext
com.webobjects.appserver Provides the WebObjects application server, session management classes, component classes, and classes to manage the request-response loop. 
com.webobjects.eocontrol Provides infrastructure for creating and manging enterprise objects. 
 

Uses of EOSharedEditingContext in com.webobjects.appserver
 

Methods in com.webobjects.appserver that return EOSharedEditingContext
 EOSharedEditingContext WOApplication.sharedEditingContext()
          Deprecated. EOSharedEditingContext.defaultSharedEditingContext should be directly used instead.
 

Uses of EOSharedEditingContext in com.webobjects.eocontrol
 

Methods in com.webobjects.eocontrol that return EOSharedEditingContext
 EOSharedEditingContext EOEditingContext.sharedEditingContext()
           
static EOSharedEditingContext EOSharedEditingContext.defaultSharedEditingContext()
          If a shared context hasn't yet been created, this method creates one and posts a DefaultSharedEditingContextWasInitializedNotification.
 EOSharedEditingContext EOSharedEditingContext.sharedEditingContext()
          Always returns null
 

Methods in com.webobjects.eocontrol with parameters of type EOSharedEditingContext
 void EOEditingContext.setSharedEditingContext(EOSharedEditingContext sharedEC)
          Sets this EOEditingContext shared editing context.
static void EOSharedEditingContext.setDefaultSharedEditingContext(EOSharedEditingContext context)
          Sets the default shared editing context.
 void EOSharedEditingContext.setSharedEditingContext(EOSharedEditingContext sharedEditingContext)
          Raises an exception unless sharedEditingContext is null.
